extensionDescription.message: Enables easy creation of GPX files from coordinates obtained from the online Swisstopo map

nameWarning.message: The name you entered has more than 16 characters: some devices might not support it!

downloadText.message: Download the saved waypoints as a GPX file and clear the waypoint list:

noCoord.message: Make sure you right-click the desired location on the map before you open this extension.

wrongWebpage.message: This extension will only work in combination with the online map on the Swisstopo website:

noCoordError.message: Error: could not read coordinates from webpage.
noCoordError.description: could not get coordinates error message

waypointAdded.message: The coordinates were successfully added to your waypoint list

noDownloadWarning.message: Error: could not download the waypoint list.
